overview: With over 20 years of management experience in the film and television industry, Kelvin has built, run and sold highly technical service companies such as 525 Post Productions (Hollywood), Virgin Mexico (Mexico City), Rushes (London), MediaLab (Paris), POP & Post Logic Studios (Los Angeles). Trained as an editor, Kelvin also worked for the BBC, ITN, and ABC News, and later worked extensively as a visual FX specialist on high-end commercials and music videos.
